quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: ~ Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
author: ~ Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: ~ William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
author: ~ Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: ~ Muhammad Ali

quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: ~ George Bernard Shaw

quote: Work like you don't need money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: ~ Satchel Paige

quote: Faith is taking the first step even you don't see the whole staircase.
author: ~ Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer - but ourselves.
author: ~ Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls.
author: ~ Joseph Campbell

quote: People often say that movitation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
author: ~ Zig Ziglar

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: ~ Charles Schulz

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: ~ Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We can complain because rose bushes have thorns, or rejoice because thorn bushes have roses.
author: ~ Abraham Lincoln

quote: Fear less, hope more; eat less, chew more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things will be yours.
author: ~ Swedish Proverb

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: ~ Marcel Proust

quote: Logic will take you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: ~ Albert Einstein

quote: If my ship sails from sight, it doesn't mean my journey ends, it simply means the river bends.
author: ~ Enoch Powell

quote: You stand out in the crowd only because you have these many, many carrying you on their shoulders.
author: ~ Desmond Tutu

quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
author: ~ Winson Churchill

quote: Learn how to exhale, the inhale whill take care of itself.
author: ~ Carla Melucci Ardito

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: ~ Plato

quote: Forever - is composed of Nows.
author: ~ Emily Dickinson

quote: Silent gratitude isn't very much use to anyone.
author: ~ Gertrude Stein

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
author: ~ Eqicurus

quote: Leap and the net will appear.
author: ~ John Burroughs

quote: Every thought we think is creating our future.
author: ~ Louise L.Hay

quote: The essence of being human is that one does not seek perfection.
author: ~ George Orwell

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: ~ Dalai Lama

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others have thrown at him.
author: ~ David Brinkly

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: ~ Maya Angelou

quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you often get it.
author: ~ W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
author: ~ Ernest Hemingway

quote: If you smile when you are alone, then you really mean it.
author: ~ Andy Rooney

quote: The only thing we can never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
author: ~ Henry Miller

quote: We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and future.
author: ~ Frederick Douglass

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it is not the same river and he's not the same man.
author: ~ Heraclitus

quote: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model.
author: ~ Vincent van Gogh

quote: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
author: ~ Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: ~ Thomas Merton

quote: When I get lost of what I am, I become what I might be.
author: ~ Lao Tzu

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: ~ Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Change your thoughts and you change the world.
author: ~ Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Laugh and your life will be lengthened, for this is the great secret of a long life.
author: ~ Og Mandino

quote: There is only one day left, always starting over: It is given to us at dawn and taken away from us at dusk.
author: ~ Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.
author: ~ Sigmund Freud

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: ~ Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: ~ Mother Teresa

quote: A mind once stretched by a new idea never return to its orginal dimensions.
author: ~ Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Happiness, not another place but this place... not for another hour, but for this hour.
author: ~ Walt Whitman

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Not is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: ~ Marie Curie

quote: Do one thing everyday that scares you.
author: ~ Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: ~ Wayne Gretzky

quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
author: ~ Franz Kafka

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: ~ Aristotle

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: ~ Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Most people are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: ~ Abraham Lincoln

quote: If it exists, it's possible.
author: ~ Jonh P. Grier

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: ~ Aristotle

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: ~ Mark Twain

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: ~ Frank Sinatra

quote: A man should always consider how much he has more than he wants and how much more unhappy he might be than he really is.
author: ~ Joseph Addison

quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: ~ Christopher Columbus

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: ~ Julie Andrews

quote: It is not the doing what you like, but in liking what you do that is the secret of happiness.
author: ~ James M. Barrie

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
author: ~ Samuael Johnson

quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
author: ~ Unknown

quote: Life shrinks or expands in propotion to one's courage.
author: ~ Anais Nin

quote: Every strike brings me to the next home run.
author: ~ Babe Ruth

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: ~ Socrates

quote: One should absorb the color of life, but one should never remember its details.
author: ~ Oscar Wilde

quote: Remember: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: ~ Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
author: ~ Winston Churchill

quote: This is no security on this earth, there is only opportunity.
author: ~ Douglas MacArthur

quote: Life is too far important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: ~ Oscar Wilde

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: ~ Norman Vaughan

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: ~ John Muir

quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
author: ~ Thomas A. Edison

quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
author: ~ Lao Tzu
